text: hey camping peeps - melissa crunched some numbers for us and looks like people who have tents and want to sleep solo can do so. Keep in mind, not everyone has a tent, so if you are still willing to share, find a buddy! Please let us know your final sleeping plans so we can keep track of logistics.
i have 2 extra tents to lend. let me know if you’d like to borrow one of them.
I don’t have a tent and am planning to go. I need a buddy!!!!
